item.title: Don't mess with the Python
item.description: `` Recently in class, we have been using Python to explore essential packages such as NumPy and Pandas. Numpy is a Python library tailored more for numeric data -specifically the manipuation of arrays - and Pandas is a Python library helpful with tabular data; like columns or rows of numbers. Additionally, we've utilized Reguar Expression operations in helping to learn how to match, search, and transform a string. Let's look at a few examples!
